name: lists_tweets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_v2.
Tool description: Twitter public data API for Tweets and users
API description: Fetches a list of tweets from a specified Twitter list using the RapidAPI service.

list_id.description: The unique identifier for the Twitter list.

cursor.description: The cursor to use for fetching the next page of results. Defaults to 'HBaAgLydmczz0y0AAA=='.

count.description: The number of tweets to retrieve. Defaults to '20'.
